languages.text: {n}Джай выгибается резко и болезненно, словно от удара бичом.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Не вы ли говорили о великой ответственности, шерин?{/d} Ласкали слух обязательствами перед Империумом?" {n}Клинок гнева готов был вырваться из ножен благоразумия Джай, но хладная торговка вовремя его усмирила.{/n} "Что ж, если таковы порядки в кругах приближенных к Великому... я научусь играть по правилам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай выгибается резко и болезненно, словно от удара бичом.{/n} "Не вы ли говорили о великой ответственности, шерин? Ласкали слух обязательствами перед Империумом?" {n}Клинок гнева готов был вырваться из ножен благоразумия Джай, но хладная торговка вовремя его усмирила.{/n} "Что ж, если таковы порядки в кругах приближенных к Великому... я научусь играть по правилам".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

languages.text: {n}ジェイは急に身をかがめ、鞭で打たれたかのように顔を歪めた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}あたしの重大な責任について話しているのはそっちじゃないの、シャリーン？{/d}帝国に対するあたしの義務について叙情的になっているのかしら？」{n}ジェイの良識の鞘から怒りの刃が抜けそうになるが、彼女はなんとかそれを食い止める。{/n}「まあ、それがエグザルテッド・ワンの親密なサークル内のルールなら…あたしはそれに従うことを学ぶわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは急に身をかがめ、鞭で打たれたかのように顔を歪めた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}あたしの重大な責任について話しているのはそっちじゃないの、シャリーン？{/d}帝国に対するあたしの義務について叙情的になっているのかしら？」{n}ジェイの良識の鞘から怒りの刃が抜けそうになるが、彼女はなんとかそれを食い止める。{/n}「まあ、それがエグザルテッド・ワンの親密なサークル内のルールなら…あたしはそれに従うことを学ぶわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊猛地弯下了腰。她表情扭曲，仿佛被鞭子抽了一样。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}难道不是你，说我肩负着重要的职责吗，亲爱的{/d}？难道不是你，说我该履行对帝国的义务吗？”{n}婕伊心中愤怒的利刃，仿佛马上就要从理智之鞘中脱鞘而出，但到了最后，她还是克制住了。{/n}“好吧，如果至高无上的神皇的侍从都要遵守这样的规矩……那我会努力遵守这些规矩的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊猛地弯下了腰。她表情扭曲，仿佛被鞭子抽了一样。{/n}“难道不是你，说我肩负着重要的职责吗，亲爱的？难道不是你，说我该履行对帝国的义务吗？”{n}婕伊心中愤怒的利刃，仿佛马上就到从理智之鞘中脱鞘而出了，但到了最后，她还是克制住了。{/n}“好吧，如果至高无上的神皇的侍从都要遵守这样的规矩……那我会努力遵守这些规矩的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se retuerce bruscamente, con la cara en una mueca, como si la hubieran azotado.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}¿No hablaba antes de la gran responsabilidad que tenía, shereen?{/d} ¿No me doraba la píldora sobre mis obligaciones con el Imperium?». {n}Jae está a punto de desenfundar su ira de la vaina de su buen hacer, pero logra contenerla.{/n} «En fin, si esas son las reglas de los allegados del Exaltado... aprenderé a jugar cumpliéndolas».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se retuerce bruscamente, con la cara en una mueca, como si la hubieran azotado.{/n} «¿No hablaba antes de la gran responsabilidad que tenía, shereen? ¿No me doraba la píldora sobre mis obligaciones con el Imperium?». {n}Jae está a punto de desenfundar su ira de la vaina de su buen hacer, pero logra contenerla.{/n} «En fin, si esas son las reglas de los allegados del Exaltado... aprenderé a jugar cumpliéndolas».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sursaute, le visage déformé, comme si vous l'aviez violemment giflée.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Ce n'est pas vous qui me parliez de mes responsabilités, shereen ?{/d} Qui m'avez bassinée avec mes devoirs envers l'Imperium ? » {n}Le bon sens de Jae est sur le point d'être éclipsé par une fureur incandescente, qu'elle parvient cependant à maîtriser.{/n} « Eh bien, si ce sont les règles qui régissent les cercles intimes de l'Exalté... j'apprendrai à les connaître. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sursaute, le visage déformé, comme si vous l'aviez violemment giflée.{/n} « Ce n'est pas vous qui me parliez de mes responsabilités, shereen ? Qui m'avez bassinée avec mes devoirs envers l'Imperium ? » {n}Le bon sens de Jae est sur le point d'être éclipsé par une fureur incandescente, qu'elle parvient cependant à maîtriser.{/n} « Eh bien, si ce sont les règles qui régissent les cercles intimes de l'Exalté... J'apprendrais à les connaître. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae zuckt zusammen und ihr Gesicht verzerrt sich, als wäre sie mit einer Peitsche geschlagen worden.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Habt nicht Ihr von meiner großen Verantwortung gesprochen, Shereen?{/d} Wortreich von meinen Verpflichtungen gegenüber dem Imperium fabuliert?" {n}Die Klinge des Zorns steht kurz davor, aus der Scheide von Jaes klarem Verstand gezogen zu werden, aber sie schafft es, sich zu beherrschen.{/n} "Gut, wenn das die Regeln im inneren Kreis des Erhabenen sind ... dann werde ich lernen, nach ihnen zu spielen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae zuckt zusammen und ihr Gesicht verzerrt sich, als wäre sie mit einer Peitsche geschlagen worden.{/n} "Habt nicht Ihr von meiner großen Verantwortung gesprochen, Shereen? Wortreich von meinen Verpflichtungen gegenüber dem Imperium fabuliert?" {n}Die Klinge des Zorns steht kurz davor, aus der Scheide von Jaes klarem Verstand gezogen zu werden, aber sie schafft es, sich zu beherrschen.{/n} "Gut, wenn das die Regeln im inneren Kreis des Erhabenen sind ... dann werde ich lernen, nach ihnen zu spielen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae iki büklüm oluyor. Yüzünde, kırbaçlanmış gibi acı dolu bir ifade var.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Bana büyük sorumluluk deyip duran sen değil miydin şirinim?{/d} İmparatorluk'a hizmet diye maval okuyordun ya." {n}Jae, hiddet kılıcını akıl kınından çekmesine ramak kalmışken kendine hâkim olmayı başarıyor.{/n} "Görkemli'nin yakın çevresinde kurallar böyle işliyorsa şayet... Ben de öğrenirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae doubles over sharply, her face contorted, as if she has been whipped.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Weren't you the one talking about my great responsibility, shereen?{/d} Waxing lyrical about my obligations to the Imperium?" {n}The blade of rage is on the verge of being drawn from the sheath of Jae's good sense, but she manages to stay it.{/n} "Well, if those are the rules in the Exalted One's intimate circles... I'll learn to play by them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae iki büklüm oluyor. Yüzünde kırbaçlanmış gibi acı dolu bir ifade var.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_DogmaticReinforcement}Bana büyük sorumluluk deyip duran sen değil miydin şirinim?{/d} İmparatorluk'a hizmet diye maval okuyordun ya?" {n}Jae'ın hiddet kılıcını akıl kınından çekmesine ramak kalıyor... Ancak kendine hâkim olmayı başarıyor.{/n} "Görkemli'nin yakın çevresinde kurallar böyle işliyorsa şayet... Ben de öğrenirim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
